This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in {{edition|java}} 1.1, which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Adventure Update]]: Part II (Java Edition 1.0.x releases).
== Mobs ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Sheep]]
|{{Animate|White Sheep JE1.png;Sheared White Sheep JE1.png|128px}}
|Can regrow their wool by eating [[Grass Block|grass]].
|-
|[[Magma Cube]]
|[[File: Magma Cube JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|Can drop [[magma cream]].
|}

== Blocks ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}}
|-
|[[Ladder]] 
|[[File:Ladder JE1.png|84px]]
|Removed collision box from ladders.
|-
|[[Fence gate]] 
|[[File:Oak Fence Gate (EW) JE2.png|84px]]
|
* The collision box on fence gates now matches that of fences.
* Fence gates can now be opened and closed with redstone.
|-
|[[Oak leaves]] 
|[[File:Oak Leaves JE3 BE1.png|84px]]
|Oak leaves now have a 1⁄200 chance of dropping [[apple]]s.
|-
|[[Melon]]s and [[pumpkin]]s
|{{Animate|Melon JE1 BE1.png;Carved Pumpkin JE1 BE1.png|84px}}
|Can now grow onto dirt instead of only farmland.
|}

== Items ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}} 
|-
|[[Spawn egg]]
| [[File:Blaze Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Cave Spider Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Chicken Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Cow Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Creeper Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Enderman Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Ghast Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Magma Cube Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Mooshroom Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Pig Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Sheep Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Silverfish Spawn Egg JE2 BE2.png|32px]][[File:Skeleton Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Slime Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Spider Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Squid Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Villager Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Wolf Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Zombie Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]][[File:Zombie Pigman Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]]
|[[Creative]] mode inventory only.
|Used to spawn a specified mob. There are 20 spawn eggs available, one for each mob except the [[ender dragon]], the [[giant]] and the [[snow golem]].
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
|[[Apple]]
|[[File:Apple JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Are now legitimately obtainable without killing [[Notch]].
|-
|[[Music disc]]
|{{Animate|Music Disc 13 JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Cat JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Blocks JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Chirp JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Far JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Mall JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Mellohi JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Stal JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Strad JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc Ward JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc 11 JE1 BE1.png|84px}}
|
* Music discs can now drop from [[creeper]]s killed by [[skeleton]]s.
* The "Blocks", "Chirp", "Far", "Mall", "Mellohi", "Stal", "Strad", and "Ward" music discs are now legitimately obtainable. The "11" music disc remains unobtainable until [[Java Edition 1.4.4|1.4.4]].
|}
